article_title: Some see poverty, not access to care, as main obstacle to kids' health
article_text:

og.description: At Ginter Park Elementary School in Richmond, teacher Catherine Brown stops class for a few minutes whenever she feels like the kindergartners and first-graders in her room need a “brain break.”
